headline: Crown Castle (CCI) Valuation Check As Fiber Sale And DISH Termination Reshape Cash Flow Outlook
summary: Crown Castle (CCI) is in the spotlight after moving to sell its small cell and fiber businesses, while terminating its agreement with DISH Wireless over payment defaults. This combination puts revenue mix and dividend resilience under scrutiny. See our latest analysis for Crown Castle. The recent decision to sell the small cell and fiber businesses and end the DISH agreement comes after a mixed stretch for investors, with a 30 day share price return of 2.36% but a 3 year total shareholder...
